#include<iostream>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;
int a[100001],st1[4*100001],st2[4*100001];
void buildstmin(int idx,int ss,int se)
{
	if(ss==se)
	{
		st1[idx]=a[ss];
			st2[idx]=a[ss];
		return;
	}
int mid=(ss+se)/2;
	buildstmin(2*idx,ss,mid);
	buildstmin(2*idx+1,mid+1,se);
	st1[idx]=min(st1[2*idx],st1[2*idx+1]);
		st2[idx]=max(st2[2*idx],st2[2*idx+1]);
	
}

 int querymax(int idx,int ss,int se,int l,int r)
{
		if(r<l||l>se||r<ss)
	return 0;
	if(ss>=l&&se<=r)
	return st2[idx];
   int mid=(ss+se)/2;
   int leftans=querymax(2*idx,ss,mid,l,r);
     int rightans=querymax(2*idx+1,mid+1,se,l,r);
    return max(leftans,rightans);
}
 int querymin(int idx, int ss, int se, int l, int r)
{
	if(r<l||l>se||r<ss)
	return INT_MAX;
	if(ss>=l&&se<=r)
	return st1[idx];
     int mid=(ss+se)/2;
     int leftans=querymin(2*idx,ss,mid,l,r);
     int rightans=querymin(2*idx+1,mid+1,se,l,r);
    return min(leftans,rightans);
}
int main()
{
	 int n;
	scanf("%ld",&n);
	 int i;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		cin>>a[i];
	}
	buildstmin(1,1,n);
	 int q;
	cin>>q;
	while(q--)
	{
		 int l,r;
		cin>>l>>r;
		
	//	buildstmax(1,1,n);
		
		 int min=querymin(1,1,n,l+1,r+1);
	//	cout<<min;
		 int max1=querymax(1,1,n,l+1,r+1);
	//	cout<<max1;
	  
		 int max2=max(querymax(1,1,n,1,l),querymax(1,1,n,r+2,n));
	//	cout<<max2;
	//cout<<(float)(max1-min)/2;
	    float ans=min+max((float)max2,(float)(max1-min)/2);
		printf("%.01f\n",ans);
		
	}
	 
}
